name: HCTECH_HC300-M2H

extruders.select:
G1 X5 Y319 ;move to wait posiotion
T0 ;switch to extruder 1
M109 S{material_print_temperature}
G1 F5000
G12 ;clean nozzle
G1 X0 Y300 F4800 ;move to start point
extruders.deselect:
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 F800 E-1 ;retract
G92 E0 ;reset extruder distance
G1 X0 Y300 F4800 ;move to start position
G1 X5 Y319 ;move to wait posiotion

pre_gcode: M140 S{bed_temp}   ; need to heat the bed
M190 S{bed_temp}   ; wait for bed temperature
M104 S{temp}       ; need to heat the nozzle
M109 S{temp}       ; wait for nozzle temperature
G1 X5 Y319 F4000 ;Move to Start Position
G1 X5 Y319 F4000 ;Move to Start Position
G1 X0 Y300 F4000 ;Move to corner
post_gcode: G1 Z1 E-1 F2400 ;Retract and raise Z
G1 X5 Y319 ;Return to Start Point
M106 S0 ;Switch off part cooling fan
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z
